response.overview: Offering something to casual and diehard fans alike, this in-depth unauthorized documentary profiles the band U2 from its earliest days under the name Feedback all the way through its mainstream success. Compiling photographs, video images, interviews, and concert footage, U2 - THE COMPLETE STORY examines the band from artistic, personal, and political standpoints, paying special attention to how the band has evolved over time and influenced a whole generation of other artists.
response.title: The U2: The Complete Story
